alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:59PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Spalding, southern Fayette, Meriwether, northwestern Pike, southern Henry, southeastern Troup, southeastern Coweta and southern Clayton Counties through 630 PM EST... At 558 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Irondale to near Turin to Cannonville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Greenville, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Senoia, Hogansville, Luthersville, Brooks, Williamson, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, Woolsey and Sunny Side. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding; Troup
